Home.title: Free Online SVG Generator
Home.subtitle: Instantly create, edit, and convert SVG vector graphics for logos, icons, illustrations, web design, UI components, banners, diagrams, and templates. High-quality, customizable, animated, and transparent SVGs—download for free, no design skills needed.

Steps.title: Create Your Logo in 3 Easy Steps
Steps.step_select_template_desc: Select from a variety of templates for your industry or use AI to generate a logo.
Steps.step_customize_desc: Freely customize text, colors, shapes, and fonts to create your unique logo.
Steps.step_download_desc: Download your finished logo in SVG, PNG, or JPG format. Ready to use immediately.

Features.title: Key Features
Features.design_templates_desc: Hundreds of templates categorized by industry and style
Features.design_customization_desc: Freely adjust text, shapes, colors, and gradients
Features.design_custom_fonts_desc: Upload and use your own fonts
Features.ai_logo_generation_desc: Automatically generate perfect logos for your brand in seconds
Features.ai_style_suggestions_desc: Automatically suggest optimal design styles for your industry
Features.ai_color_palette_desc: Automatically suggest color schemes that match your brand image
Features.animation_effects_desc: Various animations including rotation, fade, bounce, and more
Features.animation_customization_desc: Freely adjust speed, delay, repeat count, and more
Features.animation_multiple_elements_desc: Apply separate animations to text and shapes
Features.export_formats_desc: Export in SVG, PNG, and JPG formats
Features.export_high_resolution_desc: High quality output ideal for print and digital media
Features.export_transparent_background_desc: Export with transparent background in PNG and SVG
Features.sharing_save_projects_desc: Save created logos for later editing
Features.sharing_team_sharing_desc: Share projects with colleagues and clients
Features.usability_interface_desc: Easy to operate even without design knowledge
Features.usability_free_desc: Use all basic functions without registration

EditorHero.title: Free Online SVG Generator
EditorHero.subtitle: Instantly create, edit, and convert SVG vector graphics for logos, icons, illustrations, web design, UI components, banners, diagrams, and templates. High-quality, customizable, animated, and transparent SVGs—download for free, no design skills needed.

Pricing.title: Simple Pricing
Pricing.subtitle: Only pay for what you need, when you need it. No subscriptions or hidden fees.

Testimonials.title: Testimonials
Testimonials.testimonial_1_text: In just 10 minutes, I had a perfect logo for our brand. It was faster and more cost-effective than hiring a designer.
Testimonials.testimonial_2_text: This tool is perfect for quickly presenting initial logo concepts to clients. It has significantly reduced the time I spend turning ideas into visuals.
Testimonials.testimonial_3_text: I used this to create an icon set for our website. The SVG export is perfect for responsive design.
Testimonials.testimonial_4_text: I use this tool for creating visual assets for marketing campaigns. The variety of templates helps me create cohesive designs quickly.
Testimonials.testimonial_5_text: The animation features are amazing. Creating animated logos is easy and has significantly improved the impression of our website.
Testimonials.testimonial_6_text: I manage logos for multiple brands, and this tool helps me maintain design consistency. The balance of usability and functionality is perfect.

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.faq_1_answer: Yes, all basic features are available for free. You can start using it immediately without registration. Premium features will be available in the future.
FAQ.faq_2_question: Can I use the created logos commercially?
FAQ.faq_2_answer: Yes, you can freely use logos created with SVG Generator for both personal and commercial purposes. There are no copyright concerns.
FAQ.faq_3_question: Do I need to create an account?
FAQ.faq_3_answer: No, you can use all basic features without account registration. However, some features like cloud storage will require account registration in the future.
FAQ.faq_4_question: What are the benefits of SVG format?
FAQ.faq_4_answer: SVG is a vector format, so it doesn't lose quality when resized. It also has small file sizes and can include animation and interactive elements.
FAQ.faq_5_answer: Yes, you can upload font files in TTF, OTF, WOFF, and WOFF2 formats to use in your logo design.
FAQ.faq_6_question: Can I use it on mobile devices?
FAQ.faq_6_answer: Yes, SVG Generator uses responsive design and can be comfortably used on mobile devices like smartphones and tablets.

CTA.title: Create Your Logo Now
CTA.description: No registration required, completely free, create a professional logo in minutes. Design the perfect logo for your brand right now.

ExportDialog.title: Export Logo
ExportDialog.description: Export your logo in various formats
ExportDialog.svgDescription: SVG format is a vector image that won't lose quality when resized. Ideal for websites and digital media.
ExportDialog.pngDescription: PNG format is a raster image that supports transparent backgrounds. Suitable for web and digital media.
ExportDialog.jpgDescription: JPG format is a raster image ideal for photos and gradients. Transparent backgrounds are not supported.

Terms.title: Terms of Service
Terms.subtitle: Please read these terms carefully before using our service.

scope.title: 1. Scope of Application
scope.content: These Terms of Service (hereinafter referred to as 'Terms') apply to all services (hereinafter referred to as 'Service') provided by us. By using our Service, you agree to be bound by these Terms.

registration.title: 2. User Registration
registration.content: Some features of the Service may require user registration. Users must provide accurate, current, and complete information during the registration process and keep their account information updated.

prohibitedActions.title: 3. Prohibited Actions
items: Actions that violate laws, regulations, or public order and morals
Acts that infringe upon the intellectual property rights, privacy, portrait rights, or other rights of third parties
Actions that damage or may damage the reputation or credibility of other users or third parties
Actions that discriminate against or slander other users or third parties
Distribution of computer viruses or other harmful computer programs
Any other actions deemed inappropriate by us

termination.title: 4. Termination of Use
termination.content: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend your access to the Service immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason including, but not limited to, a breach of the Terms.

disclaimer.title: 5. Disclaimer of Warranty
disclaimer.content: The Service is provided on an 'AS IS' and 'AS AVAILABLE' basis. We make no warranties of any kind, whether express or implied, regarding the Service, including but not limited to warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, or non-infringement.

changes.title: 6. Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. We will provide notification of any significant changes through our website or by email. Your continued use of the Service after such modifications constitutes your acceptance of the updated Terms.

Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.subtitle: This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

collection.title: 1. Information We Collect
collection.content: We may collect personal information such as your name, email address, and other details you provide when using our service. We also collect information automatically through cookies and similar technologies about how you use our website.

usage.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
usage.content: We use the information we collect to provide and improve our services, communicate with you, and ensure security. This includes personalizing your experience, processing transactions, and analyzing usage patterns to enhance our service.

sharing.title: 3. Information Sharing
sharing.content: We do not sell your personal information to third parties. We may share information with service providers who help us operate our business, when required by law, or with your consent.

cookies.title: 4. Cookies and Similar Technologies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your browsing experience, analyze site traffic, and personalize content. You can control cookie settings through your browser preferences.

security.title: 5. Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure.

rights.title: 6. Your Rights
rights.content: Depending on your location, you may have rights regarding your personal data, including the right to access, correct, delete, or restrict processing of your data. Please contact us to exercise these rights.

changes.title: 7. Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. We will notify you of any significant changes by posting the new policy on our website.

contact.title: 8. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at support@svg-generator.com

LegalNotice.title: Legal Notice
LegalNotice.subtitle: Information based on the Act on Specified Commercial Transactions

LogoCreator.ai_prompt_label: Describe your logo idea to AI
LogoCreator.ai_placeholder: Example: A modern, simple logo for a tech company with blue and purple gradient
LogoCreator.drag_drop: Drag and drop file here or click
LogoCreator.font_name_empty_notice: Filename will be used if left empty
LogoCreator.font_size_error: Font file must be less than 5MB
LogoCreator.font_load_error: Failed to load the font. Please check if it's a valid font file.
LogoCreator.file_read_error: An error occurred while reading the file
LogoCreator.font_upload_error: An error occurred while uploading the font
LogoCreator.preset_pulse_sequence_desc: Scale up and down in sequence
LogoCreator.preset_typewriter_desc: Text appears as if being typed
LogoCreator.anim_rotate_desc: Rotates element around its center point
LogoCreator.anim_bounce_desc: Makes element bounce up and down
LogoCreator.anim_shake_desc: Shakes element from side to side
LogoCreator.ai_generator_coming_soon_message: Our AI logo generation feature is currently in development. Click the button below to be notified when it's released.
LogoCreator.prompt_placeholder: e.g. A modern, minimal logo for a tech company with blue and purple gradient...
LogoCreator.prompt_description: Describe the style, colors, shapes, and other details for your logo

NotifyModal.title: AI Feature Release Notification & Support Message
NotifyModal.description: If you would like to be notified when the AI logo generation feature is released, or want to send an encouraging message to the developer, please use the Google Form below.
